docs.snippet: The 20 percent drop was partly offset by growth in subscriptions and digital advertising. Adjusted operating profit fell to $241 million in 2016, from $289 million....
docs.lead_paragraph: The 20 percent drop was partly offset by growth in subscriptions and digital advertising. Adjusted operating profit fell to $241 million in 2016, from $289 million.

headline.main: New York Times Co.’s Decline in Print Advertising Tempered by Digital Gains
headline.print_headline: Gains in Digital Temper Times’s Print Ad Decline

docs.snippet: Weary of staging their lives for social media, young people are presenting their true selves on locked “finstagram” accounts....
docs.lead_paragraph: Weary of staging their lives for social media, young people are presenting their true selves on locked “finstagram” accounts.
docs.abstract: Teenagers and young adults are now creating 'finstagrams', fake Instagram accounts meant to reflect their true selves and reserved for only close friends and family.

headline.main: On Fake Instagram, a Chance to Be Real
